entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
